CustomField.description: If the account Is a ULS Primary Account, returns the account name. If the account has a ULS Primary Account, returns that name. Otherwise, the field is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the account Is a ULS Primary Account, returns the account name. If the account has a ULS Primary Account, returns that name. Otherwise, the field is blank.
CustomField.label: ULS Top Level Account
